trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som inneholder lyd-og/eller video.

trans-unit.source: When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource.
trans-unit.target: Når du distribuerer medium med programmet, kan du ikke bruke en media-fil som en ressurs.

trans-unit.source: In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`.
trans-unit.target: I prosjektfilen, må du i stedet sette medietypen til `Content` og `CopyToOutputDirectory` til `PreserveNewest` eller `Always`.

trans-unit.source: MediaElement can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the control: independent mode or clock mode.
trans-unit.target: MediaElement kan brukes i to forskjellige måter, avhengig av hva som driver kontrollen: uavhengige eller klokken-modus.

trans-unit.source: When used in the independent mode, the MediaElement is analogous to an image, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Source%2A> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] can be directly specified.
trans-unit.target: Når det brukes i modus for uavhengig av MediaElement tilsvarer et bilde og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Source%2A> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] kan angis direkte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: In clock mode, the MediaElement can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> entries in the timing tree.
trans-unit.target: Modusen klokken i MediaElement kan sammenlignes med som mål for en animasjon, og derfor har det tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oppføringer i treet tidsberegning.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om media modi den [Multimedia oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of controlling a MediaElement in independent mode, see [How to: Control a MediaElement (Play, Pause, Stop, Volume, and Speed)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på kontrollerer MediaElement i uavhengig modus, kan du se [slik: kontrollere en MediaElement (Play Pause, Stopp, volum og raskere)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened> event has been raised, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the control will report as zero as the media content is used to determine the final size and location of the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>hendelsen er utført, den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>kontrollens rapporteres som null som medieinnholdet brukes til å bestemme den endelige størrelsen og plasseringen av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: For audio only content, these properties will always be zero.
trans-unit.target: Lyd bare innhold, vil disse egenskapene alltid være null.

trans-unit.source: For a fixed size control, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and/or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties can be set.
trans-unit.target: For en fast Størrelseskontroll av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>og/eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>Egenskaper kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties but not both.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde det mediet størrelsesforhold, kan du imidlertid angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>Egenskaper, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Arranges and sizes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ordner og størrelsen på en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Size used to arrange the control.
trans-unit.target: Størrelse som brukes til å ordne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a ratio of volume across speakers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et forhold mellom volumet på tvers av høyttalere.

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.
trans-unit.target: Verdien -1 representerer 100 venstre høyttalervolumet og 1 representerer 100% høyre høyttalervolumet.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The ratio of volume across speakers in the range between -1 and 1.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom volumet på tvers av høyttalere mellom 1 og 1.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Balance*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Balance*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Balance*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when media buffering has ended.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når mediet bufring er avsluttet.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.BufferingEnded"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the percentage of buffering progress made.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir prosentdelen av bufring fremdriften.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of buffering completed for streaming content.
trans-unit.target: Prosent av bufring fullført for direkteavspilling innhold.

trans-unit.source: The value ranges from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdiområder fra 0 til 1.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when media buffering has begun.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når mediet bufring har begynt.

trans-unit.target: ## Rutet hendelsesinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Rutingstrategi | Bobling | | Representanten | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.BufferingStarted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.BufferingStarted"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the media can be paused.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet kan være midlertidig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the media can be paused; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis mediet kan være midlertidig; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clock associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> that controls media playback.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir klokken knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref> som kontrollerer medier.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property puts the media element into a mode in which it utilizes the timing engine.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen setter elementet media i en modus der det benytter tidsberegning-motoren.

trans-unit.source: Any media that was previously playing is stopped and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] associated with the new clock is opened.
trans-unit.target: Mediet ble tidligere spiller er stoppet og [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] knyttet til den nye klokken er åpnet.

trans-unit.source: A clock associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> that controls media playback.
trans-unit.target: En klokken knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref> som kontrollerer medier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the media.
trans-unit.target: Lukker mediet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a percentage value indicating the amount of download completed for content located on a remote server.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvor mye nedlasting fullført for innhold som finnes på en ekstern server.

trans-unit.source: A percentage value indicating the amount of download completed for content located on a remote server.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir hvor mye nedlasting fullført for innhold som finnes på en ekstern server.

trans-unit.source: The value ranges from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdiområder fra 0 til 1.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the media has audio.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet har lyd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the media has audio; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis mediet har lyd; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the media has video.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet har video.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the media has video; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis mediet har video. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get a value indicating whether the media is buffering.
trans-unit.target: Få en verdi som angir om mediet hurtigbufring.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the media is buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis mediet bufring; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio is muted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om lyden dempes.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if audio is muted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis lyden dempes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.IsMuted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.IsMuted*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.IsMuted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the load behavior <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"></xref> for the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir virkemåte ved innlasting <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"> </xref> for mediet.

trans-unit.source: LoadedBehavior must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState> in order to interactively control media with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Pause%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Stop%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: LoadedBehavior må settes til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>for å styre interaktivt medium med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Pause%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Stop%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Pause%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The load behavior <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"></xref> set for the media.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåte ved innlasting <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"> </xref> angitt for mediet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Updates the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringer av <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a parent <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av en overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is the first pass of layout.
trans-unit.target: Dette er første pass av oppsett.

trans-unit.source: The upper limit the element should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: Elementet ikke kan være lengre enn den øvre grensen.

trans-unit.source: The desired size.
trans-unit.target: Ønsket størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the media has ended.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når mediet er avsluttet.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter naturlig varigheten mediet.

trans-unit.source: The value returned is independent of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er uavhengig av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: NaturalDuration is not accurate until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: NaturalDuration er ikke riktig før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>hendelsen er utført.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: The natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: Naturlig varigheten mediet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the video associated with the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på video som er knyttet til mediet.

trans-unit.source: NaturalVideoHeight is not accurate until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: NaturalVideoHeight er ikke riktig før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>hendelsen er utført.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: The height of the video associated with the media.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på video som er knyttet til mediet.

trans-unit.source: Audio files will return zero.
trans-unit.target: Lydfiler returnerer null.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the video associated with the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden knyttet til mediet.

trans-unit.source: NaturalVideoWidth is not accurate until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: NaturalVideoWidth er ikke riktig før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>hendelsen er utført.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: The width of the video associated with the media.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på video som er knyttet til mediet.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> objekt for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object during the render pass of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tegner innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objekt under trinnet gjengivelse av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> til å tegne.

trans-unit.source: Pauses media at the current position.
trans-unit.target: Stopper mediet på gjeldende posisjon.

trans-unit.source: This method pauses the media if the media is currently running.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden stopper midlertidig mediet hvis mediet kjører.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A> method can be used to resume.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A>metoden kan brukes til å gjenoppta.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Play%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen er ikke -`null`, tidsberegning motoren kontrollerer media avspilling virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har en effekt hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>egenskapen er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: Plays media from the current position.
trans-unit.target: Spiller medier fra gjeldende posisjon.

trans-unit.source: This method will begin the media if it is not currently active or resume media if it is paused.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil begynne mediet hvis det er aktivt eller gjenoppta media hvis den er midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect if the media is currently running.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen virkning hvis mediet kjører.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen er ikke -`null`, tidsberegning motoren kontrollerer media avspilling virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har en effekt hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.LoadedBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>egenskapen er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjeldende posisjon for gå gjennom det mediet avspilling gang.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property can enable you to jump to different points in playback (also known as seeking).
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen, kan du gå til ulike tidspunkter i avspilling (også kjent som søking).

trans-unit.source: Not all media types allow seek operations.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle medier typer tillate søk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaFailed> event will fire if the media source does not allow seeking.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaFailed>hendelsen vil gjelde hvis kilden media ikke tillater søking.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaFailed>

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect until after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened> event has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen virkning før etter den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>hendelsen oppstod.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan angis bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen er ikke -`null`, tidsberegning motoren kontrollerer media avspilling virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of time since the beginning of the media.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid siden begynnelsen av mediet.

trans-unit.source: The default is 00:00:00.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 00:00:00.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>egenskapen er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a script command is encountered in the media.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en skriptkommando for er funnet i mediet.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref> will update frames for seek operations while paused.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref> vil oppdatere forhandleren for søk mens stoppet midlertidig.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, seeking to a specific location will only update the displayed frame if media is playing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `false`, søker til en spesifikk plassering vil bare update vises rammen hvis media spilles.

trans-unit.source: Setting ScrubbingEnabled to `true` can incur some performance costs, especially when interactively controlling media playback.
trans-unit.target: Angi ScrubbingEnabled til `true` kan påløper kostnader for noen ytelse kostnader spesielt når kontrollerer interaktivt medier.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if frames are updated while paused; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forhandleren er oppdatert mens pause; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.ScrubbingEnabled*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.ScrubbingEnabled*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.ScrubbingEnabled*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a media source on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir mediekilde på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the value of this property causes the media to play.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen fører til at mediet til å spille.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan angis bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen er ikke -`null`, tidsberegning motoren kontrollerer media avspilling virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the source of the element.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] som angir kilden for elementet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Source*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Source*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir raskere forholdet mellom mediet.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan angis bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen er ikke -`null`, tidsberegning motoren kontrollerer media avspilling virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Audio playback may not occur unless the value of SpeedRatio is 1.
trans-unit.target: Lyd avspilling kan ikke oppstå hvis verdien for SpeedRatio er 1.

trans-unit.source: The speed ratio of the media.
trans-unit.target: Hastigheten forholdet mellom mediet.

trans-unit.source: The valid range is between 0 (zero) and infinity.
trans-unit.target: Det gyldige området er mellom 0 (null) og infinity.

trans-unit.source: Values less than 1 yield slower than normal playback, and values greater than 1 yield faster than normal playback.
trans-unit.target: Verdier mindre enn 1 kapasitet lengre tid enn vanlig avspilling og verdiene som er større enn 1 kapasitet fortere enn vanlig avspilling.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are treated as 0.
trans-unit.target: Negative verdier behandles som 0.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>egenskapen er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: Stops and resets media to be played from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: Stopper og tilbakestiller media spilles fra begynnelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.Clock%2A> property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.
